item.title: Testing Mysql With Go
item.description: I wanted to test my application and I realized that it wasn’t organized in a testable fashion. My main function did a bunch of environment configuration that I couldn’t replicate in my tests. Stuff like configure clients for Elasticsearch, Redis, SendGrid, and most importantly, MySQL. I use MySQL to store my user credentials, organizations (user groups), and roles. As an aside, organizations are separate entities, and roles are relations between users and organizations.
